Strength of Ten.name: Strength of Ten
Strength of Ten.flavor: Your conviction lends you the force to repel nearby foes.
Strength of Ten.onHit: 2[W] + Charisma modifier force damage, and you push the target 3 squares. The target is also subject to your divine sanction until the start of your next turn.
Strength of Ten.effect: After the attack, you shift to a square within the blast.

Quester’s Discipline.name: Quester’s Discipline
Quester’s Discipline.flavor: Deceit, despair, and weakness find no purchase in your heart.
Quester’s Discipline.trigger: An attack that would blind, daze, dominate, stun, or weaken you hits you
Quester’s Discipline.effect: The triggering attack’s conditions are negated against you.

Virtuous Wrath.name: Virtuous Wrath
Virtuous Wrath.flavor: Your unflinching dedication is a dreadful bane to your enemies, who recoil from the strike.
Virtuous Wrath.onHit: 4[W] + Charisma modifier damage, and you push the target 5 squares. The target is weakened (save ends).
